section1.title: 1. Information We Collect
section1.intro: We collect information you provide directly to us when you create an account, use our Service, or communicate with us. This includes:
section1.item2: Financial transaction data (amounts, categories, dates, descriptions)
section1.item4: Payment information (processed securely by our payment processor, Paddle)

section2.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
section2.intro: We use the information we collect to:
section2.item1: Provide, maintain, and improve our Service
section2.item2: Process transactions and send related information
section2.item3: Send technical notices, updates, and support messages
section2.item4: Respond to your comments and questions
section2.item5: Analyze usage patterns to improve user experience

section3.title: 3. Data Storage and Security
section3.p1: Your data is stored securely using Supabase, a PostgreSQL database with enterprise-grade security. We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.
section3.p2: However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure. While we strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your personal information, we cannot guarantee its absolute security.

section4.title: 4. Payment Processing
section4.content: Payment information is processed by Paddle, our third-party payment processor. We do not store your full credit card information on our servers. Paddle's privacy policy governs the collection and processing of your payment information.

section5.title: 5. Data Retention
section5.content: We retain your information for as long as your account is active or as needed to provide you services. If you wish to delete your account, please contact us. After account deletion, we may retain certain information as required by law or for legitimate business purposes.

section6.title: 6. Data Sharing
section6.intro: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your information only in the following circumstances:
section6.item1: With service providers who assist in our operations (e.g., Paddle for payment processing)
section6.item2: To comply with legal obligations or respond to lawful requests
section6.item3: To protect our rights, privacy, safety, or property
section6.item4: With your consent or at your direction

section7.title: 7. Your Data Rights
section7.item1: Access, update, or delete your personal information
section7.item2: Object to processing of your information
section7.item3: Request restriction of processing your information

section8.title: 8. Children's Privacy
section8.content: Our Service is not intended for children under 18 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 18. If you become aware that a child has provided us with personal information, please contact us.

section9.title: 9. Changes to This Privacy Policy
section9.content: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date.

section10.title: 10. Contact Us
section10.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us through our support channels.
